art.desc: A portrait from my collection on works inspired by Disco Elysium

gamedev.title: Hellwaste
gamedev.desc: My solo game project - a bullet-hell, 2D, pixelart, exploration shooter where your choices matter. Developed in Godot Engine and covered on my YouTube channel. Everything from code and design to art and effects (except sound effects) was made by me.

gamedev.title: My most recent devlog of Hellwaste
gamedev.desc: Every video is its own little project.

gamedev.title: BabushCats
gamedev.desc: Our current project at Deez Games. I'm in charge of art, visual effects and coding.
